short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful tweaks to make MyLearningSpace even better!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This useful tool expands on MyLearningSpaces current capabilities and adds many useful features!

Currently MyLS++:
Calculates your current grade achieved in your courses, and displays it right in the grades tab!

Many more awesome features to come, send me an email with suggestions!
